title: An Affair to Remember: Ale Paul's Cumpleaños!
content:
It seems we have another birthday today! Happy birthday to Supreme Scriptmeister: [Alejandro Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203183646/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Alejandro%252BPaul). Sorry I wasn’t there to celebrate with you in SF, but hopefully the folks there convinced you to come to typecon. Hope your big day is a happy one!

 [‹ Pop to your hearts' content](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203183646/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20359 "Go to previous forum topic") [anyone familiar with Basel design, basel design Movement ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203183646/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19423 "Go to next forum topic")
author: paul d hunt

comments.content: Ale, viejo amigo, recuerdos por un Año Nuevo hermoso!
Happy Birthday Alejandro. It was great to meet you in SF. Keep in touch; scripts are a favorite topic of mine!

Hope your celebrations were the best.

There’ll be a little something extra in your quarterly royalty payment next month.

- Love, Veer

Feliz cumple Alejandro  
Que cumplas muchos más
thanks to everybody. the wine was good, the food too, and the friends and family at home and no font work the whole day! :P
Happy Birthday, ya Argentinian loon! :^D Keep on scripting.
